# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a copy of the provided section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ snapshot: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshot<ItemIdentifierType>)
```

## Creating a section snapshot

- **init()**: Creates an empty section snapshot.
- **snapshot(of:includingParent:)**: Creates a section snapshot that contains the child items of the specified parent item, optionally including the parent item.
- **append(_:to:)**: Adds the specified items as child items of the specified parent item in the section snapshot.

items.description: Creates a section snapshot that contains the child items of the specified parent item, optionally including the parent item.
items.name: snapshot(of:includingParent:)
